body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us today. My name is Philip Johnson and I work for Top Cars Company. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Tammy. Can you please provide me with your phone number just in case we get disconnected?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, two three four, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also confirm your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great. We have your contact information now, Tammy. Is there anything specific you need assistance with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm having some issues with the pricing at the dealership and it's making me feel sad.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Tammy. I will do my best to assist you with that. Thank you for sharing your concerns. We value your feedback.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Tammy. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day.
